title: We are hiring: Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote).
job_overview:
We are hiring: Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote).
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month based on experience

Your role:

Create and manage digital ad campaigns on Google & Facebook.

Track key metrics and optimize for better ROI.

Collaborate remotely with the marketing team.

Requirements:

1+ year experience running Google Ads or Meta Ads.

Strong reporting & data analysis skills.
